Reviews.Title: “Globally fine”
Reviews.Author: Chris-Belgium
Reviews.Content: location convenient close subway walking distance activities reception ok super friendly help little perfectly clean furniture comfortable unfortunately isolation poor makes noisy bars door corridor earplugs help breakfast close restaurant poor fresh bad quality advise elsewhere overall value pretty
